query: SELECT id, name, slug, atoll, CHAR_LENGTH(atoll) as len FROM island_guides WHERE slug IN ('maafushi-island', 'guraidhoo-island', 'thulusdhoo-island')
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT id, name, slug, atoll, CHAR_LENGTH(atoll) as len FROM island_guides WHERE slug IN ('maafushi-island', 'guraidhoo-island', 'thulusdhoo-island')
